channel.title: Fixing In-Game Highscores
channel.description:
I have a top In-Game Highscores when u click the scoreboard in my delta server. it says the total level of the players who are logged in and put them in order for best to worst aka: "Highscores" but i want to make it so it counts offline players to. so its like a in-Game, overall Highscores. I have no clue how to do this and any help would be great.
If you want the codes i got in my client.java and server.java ide be glad to supply u with 'em.

item.title: Fixing In-Game Highscores
item.dc:creator: @swebbyscape swebbyscape
item.description:
@swebbyscape wrote:

Ik how to do the online highscores like ive made it and it works on Local, but idk how to get it so everyone can see it, idk much about mySQL and the tut doesnt explain it very well, ive tried.

Read full topic
